How to set up BioMAJ download tool.

= Introduction =

Download from http://biomaj.genouest.org/page_id=11
  * biomaj-1.2.0 and
  * biomaj-watcher_1.2.0 (the web-interface to create and monitor download jobs)

Follow the instructions in biomaj-1.2.0/INSTALL to set up BioMAJ.

The following configuration was used in this Cancer Genomics Linkage Application.

  # Install MySQL
  # Run MySQL scripts to create BioMAJ tables
  # Create a new user for the BioMAJ service
  * user: _yourBioMAJuserName_
  * password: _yourBiomajPassword_
  # NOTE: The supplied mysql.sql script from the original download has missing column values in the *banks* table. Run the following *mysql_FIXED.sql* instead:
{{{
$ mysql -u yourBioMAJuserName -p yourBiomajPassword
> mysql_FIXED.sql
> mysql_to_1.2.sql
}}}

  # Manually create an admin user in the database
{{{
$ mysql -u yourBioMAJuserName -p yourBiomajPassword
> show databases;
> use biomaj_log;
> show tables;
> INSERT INTO bw_user(login, password, auth_type) VALUES('admin', SHA1('yourPassword'), 'local');
}}}
